SEARCH
Package Vehicle

Class DamageStatus

java.lang.Object
Vehicle.DamageStatus
public class DamageStatus extends Object
Manages and tracks the damage status of a vehicle. This includes the current damage status as well as the history of damage the vehicle has suffered and inflicted on others.

    • setCurrentStatus

      public void setCurrentStatus(double currentStatus)
      Sets the current damage status of the vehicle.
      Parameters:
      currentStatus - The new damage status to be set.

    • getSufferedDamageHistory

      public ArrayList<Double> getSufferedDamageHistory()
      Retrieves the history of damage the vehicle has suffered.
      Returns:
      A new ArrayList containing the history of suffered damage.

    • setSufferedDamageHistory

      public void setSufferedDamageHistory(ArrayList<Double> sufferedDamageHistory)
      Sets the history of damage the vehicle has suffered.
      Parameters:
      sufferedDamageHistory - An ArrayList containing the new history of suffered damage.

    • getGeneratedDamageHistory

      public ArrayList<Double> getGeneratedDamageHistory()
      Retrieves the history of damage the vehicle has inflicted on others.
      Returns:
      A new ArrayList containing the history of inflicted damage.

    • setGeneratedDamageHistory

      public void setGeneratedDamageHistory(ArrayList<Double> generatedDamageHistory)
      Sets the history of damage the vehicle has inflicted on others.
      Parameters:
      generatedDamageHistory - An ArrayList containing the new history of inflicted damage.

    • updateDamageStatus

      public void updateDamageStatus(double damage)
      Updates the current damage status of the vehicle based on new damage incurred. This method should incorporate the new damage into both the current status and the suffered damage history.
      Parameters:
      damage - The amount of new damage to be added to the current status.

    • calculateSufferedDamage

      public double calculateSufferedDamage(Vehicle otherVehicle)
      Calculates the total damage this vehicle has suffered from another specified vehicle.
      Parameters:
      otherVehicle - The vehicle from which the damage originated.
      Returns:
      The total damage suffered from the specified vehicle.

    • calculateGeneratedDamage

      public double calculateGeneratedDamage(Vehicle otherVehicle)
      Calculates the total damage this vehicle has inflicted on another specified vehicle.
      Parameters:
      otherVehicle - The vehicle that received the damage.
      Returns:
      The total damage inflicted on the specified vehicle.
